body:
Try looking for the solution of your problem on Rhino forum:
[http://discourse.mcneel.com/c/rhino-for-windows](http://discourse.mcneel.com/c/rhino-for-windowshttp://)

Attach the **Ladybug discussion.3dm** file and show them how it [looks like on my PC](http://api.ning.com/files/NsUCuETiBEslAJ4hXjCUsA53b7BpA8fE6dAFCY5kNr*5Mvj15PPtTRalTT-pMuywTVlc3y3Y2329NTvl4yslxAmVUrATMr2G/TOF_Oslo.jpg), and then post the screenshot of how it looks like on yours. I think they will solve your Rhino curves preview issue.
